penis.transformationDescription:
[npc.she] [npc.verb(feel)] a warmth start to spread through [npc.her] penis as it starts to become erect. Suddenly a wave of euphoria spreads through [npc.her] body as the skin around [npc.her] shaft feels strange. Looking down at [npc.her] engorged appendage, [npc.she] notice [npc.her] foreskin starts to shrink as it's absorbed into [npc.her] cock. You then realise sections of your penis started to protrude above the rest, as it becomes ribbed along the entire shaft. [npc.She] then notice the tip of [npc.her] penis begins to become pointed, causing a bit of precum to leak out the end. Just as [npc.she] thought the transformation had finished, [npc.she] feel a sudden urgent pressure building at the tip of [npc.her] penis. [npc.She] let out a gasp as the sensation becomes unbearable. Then, as if a switch was flipped, a steam of honey hit the floor, marking the end of [npc.her] reproductive organs changing.
[npc.She] now [npc.has] a [style.boldYellow(drone penis)], [npc.materialDescriptor] [npc.penisFullDescription(true)].
[npc.She] [npc.has] [style.boldYellow([npc.ballsCount]#IF(npc.isInternalTesticles()) internal#ENDIF balls)], [npc.materialDescriptor] [npc.ballsFullDescription(true)], which produce [npc.cumColour(true)] [style.boldYellow(drone honey)].
